Texts of Main Parts.US1: #G11# As a web recruiter manager, i want to confirm the #recruiter# is #set up# and working properly on science360.gov.
Texts of Main Parts.US2: #G11# As a web recruiter manager, i want to confirm the #recruiter# is set up and #working properly#,

Texts of USs.US1: #G11# As a web recruiter manager, I want to confirm the recruiter is set up and working properly on Science360.gov.
Texts of USs.US2: #G11# As a web recruiter manager, I want to confirm the recruiter is set up and working properly, so that I can deploy it on more pages.

Texts of Main Parts.US1: #G10# As a trainer, i want to #update# one of my existing courses or #events#,
Texts of Main Parts.US2: #G10# As a trainer, i want to #delete# one of my courses or #events#,

Texts of USs.US1: #G10# As a trainer, I want to update one of my existing courses or events, so that it reflects accurate information.
Texts of USs.US2: #G10# As a trainer, I want to delete one of my courses or events, so that it's no longer listed if I cancel for some reason.

Texts of Main Parts.US1: #G10# As a site admin, i want to #delete# #any course# or event,
Texts of Main Parts.US2: #G10# As a site editor, i want to #update# #any course# or event,

Texts of USs.US1: #G10# As a site admin, I want to delete any course or event, so that I can remove things that will no longer occur.
Texts of USs.US2: #G10# As a site editor, I want to update any course or event, so that I can fix things the original author hasn't.

Texts of Main Parts.US1: #G10# As a site editor, i want to #update# any course or #event#,
Texts of Main Parts.US2: #G10# As a trainer, i want to #turn# a course into an #event# or an #event# into a course,

Texts of USs.US1: #G10# As a site editor, I want to update any course or event, so that I can fix things the original author hasn't.
Texts of USs.US2: #G10# As a trainer, I want to turn a course into an event or an event into a course, so that I can correctly classify anything that was entered incorrectly.

Texts of Main Parts.US1: #G10# As a site admin, i want to #delete# any course or #event#,
Texts of Main Parts.US2: #G10# As a trainer, i want to #turn# a course into an #event# or an #event# into a course,

Texts of USs.US1: #G10# As a site admin, I want to delete any course or event, so that I can remove things that will no longer occur.
Texts of USs.US2: #G10# As a trainer, I want to turn a course into an event or an event into a course, so that I can correctly classify anything that was entered incorrectly.

Texts of Main Parts.US1: #G27# As a patron, i want to #know# which #reports#/datasets are coming out when,
Texts of Main Parts.US2: #G27# As a patron, i want to select/#deselect# #reports#/datasets to be emailed, possibly many at one time, when new versions are available.

Texts of USs.US1: #G27# As a patron, I want to know which reports/datasets are coming out when, so that I can access latest report/dataset.
Texts of USs.US2: #G27# As a patron, I want to select/deselect reports/datasets to be emailed, possibly many at one time, when new versions are available.

Texts of Main Parts.US1: #G27# As an Extension Educator, i want to have a place to store a variety of documents, presentations and data sets i've created, that doesn't require an extra step in making available on my own county/region/project site (i.e. a #list# or directory of materials there is #automatically updated# when placed in a central archive/repository).
Texts of Main Parts.US2: #G27# As a DB/IR administrator, i want to #see# a #list# of all administrators for ease of administering accounts.

Texts of USs.US1: #G27# As an Extension Educator, I want to have a place to store a variety of documents, presentations and data sets I've created, that doesn't require an extra step in making available on my own County/Region/Project site (i.e. a list or directory of materials there is automatically updated when placed in a central archive/repository).
Texts of USs.US2: #G27# As a DB/IR administrator, I want to see a list of all administrators for ease of administering accounts.

Texts of Main Parts.US1: #G27# As a repository support team member, i want to #rename# a #collection#,
Texts of Main Parts.US2: #G27# As a Cornell faculty member, i want to have some control over how #items# within my #collection# #sort# in #collection# contents lists,

Texts of USs.US1: #G27# As a repository support team member, I want to rename a collection, so that I can fulfill the collection owner's request.
Texts of USs.US2: #G27# As a Cornell faculty member, I want to have some control over how items within my collection sort in collection contents lists, so that I can control how my work is presented.

Texts of Main Parts.US1: #G27# As a researcher, i want to #search within# a #repository# or collection in an effective manner, including searching within subsets of a given collection,
Texts of Main Parts.US2: #G27# As an asset manager, i want to be assured that the #assets# can be #taken out# of the #repository#, and that the #assets# #taken out# are the same as those that are put in.

Texts of USs.US2: #G27# As an asset manager, I want to be assured that the assets can be taken out of the repository, and that the assets taken out are the same as those that are put in.

Texts of USs.US2: #G27# As a library staff member, I want to access useful and comprehensive usage statistics and analytics, including altmetrics, at the repository, collection, author, and item level, so that I can assess the results of this service.

Texts of Main Parts.US1: #G19# As an OlderPerson, i want to have alfred to give me goals and missions that encourage me to #do# new activities and #exercises# and to go out.
Texts of Main Parts.US2: #G19# As a MedicalCaregiver, i want to give corrective feedback if #exercises# are #performed wrong#, too much or in any other way harmful to the user.

Texts of USs.US1: #G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have ALFRED to give me goals and missions that encourage me to do new activities and exercises and to go out.
Texts of USs.US2: #G19# As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to give corrective feedback if exercises are performed wrong, too much or in any other way harmful to the user.
